name: Peacefull Robot V2
description:
Play as an angry robot who's sick of the chaos and annoyances of the world. Destroy humans to become more peaceful.

The less humans there are, the more peaceful you become.

Pick up items to increase your stats, but there is a cost. Less items means more energy.

Less energy means better stats. There was quite a bit more I wanted to add, but unfortunately, I ran out of time.

This is for the BlackthorneProd Game Jam.

All assets, code, art, and voice are done by me.
